mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.invntr.mapper.RawMtrInvntrMapper.selectRawMtrInvntr */ RI.APC_CD AS APC_CD , RI.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , RI.PLTNO AS PLTNO , RI.WRHS_YMD AS WRHS_YMD , RI.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , RI.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , RI.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , RI.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , RI.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , RI.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , RI.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , RI.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , RI.BX_KND AS BX_KND , RI.WRHS_QNTT AS WRHS_QNTT , RI.WRHS_WGHT AS WRHS_WGHT , RI.INPT_QNTT AS INPT_QNTT , RI.INPT_WGHT AS INPT_WGHT , RI.INVNTR_QNTT AS INVNTR_QNTT , RI.INVNTR_WGHT AS INVNTR_WGHT , (SELECT SUM(X.CMND_QNTT) FROM TB_SORT_CMND X WHERE X.APC_CD = RI.APC_CD AND X.PLTNO = RI.PLTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N') AS CMND_QNTT , (SELECT SUM(X.CMND_WGHT) FROM TB_SORT_CMND X WHERE X.APC_CD = RI.APC_CD AND X.PLTNO = RI.PLTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N') AS CMND_WGHT , RI.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR RI WHERE RI.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND RI.WRHSNO = #{wrhsno}
